page.title: 02MY DAY
page.content: SAt half past seven my dad awakens me by shouting up the stairs .I get dressed and I go down stairs to have some toast and a cup of tea.Then I have a wash and I make my bed and I call for my mate.We set off to school at ten past eight to play football.At ten to nine we go inside to do some work.The morning consists of maths, english and sometimes P.E.When it is ten past twelve we have our sandwiches and we go for break.After that we do other work like a project until half past two when it is time for break.Near the end of the day our teacher reads us a story and at half past three it is time to go home and I play football.
